active_skill.name: Tea Break
active_skill.description:
Creates a heartfelt afternoon snack. The snack will generate Energy for the receiving Agent once made and delivered.

Energy Generation
[4+Bangboo Level ×0.08]/[4.2+Bangboo Level ×0.08]/[4.4+Bangboo Level ×0.08]/[4.6+Bangboo Level ×0.08]/[4.8+Bangboo Level ×0.08]

Cooldown 24s

additional_ability.name: Personal Butler
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Victoria Housekeeping Co. characters in your squad: Active Skill generates an additional 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% Energy.

chain_attack.name: Afternoon Dessert
chain_attack.description:
Use a frying pan and pancakes to attack enemies from afar, dealing massive Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier:
1024%/1092%/1161%/1229%/1297%

Daze Multiplier: 
147%/156%/166%/176%/186%
